meanings.definition: A pair of muscles located in the upper back and neck region.
meanings.sent1: The splenii help support the head and neck.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often strengthen their splenii muscles for better posture.
meanings.sent3: During the race, his splenii muscles felt like two strong pillars holding him up.
meanings.sent4: Her splenii muscles were like sturdy cables, keeping her spine straight.
meanings.sent5: The splenii muscles, like two loyal guards, protect the upper body from strain.

meanings.definition: The plural form of splenius, a muscle that extends from the base of the skull to the upper back.
meanings.sent1: He felt a twinge in his splenii after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: The splenii play a crucial role in supporting the head and neck.
meanings.sent3: The splenii muscles seemed to have a mind of their own, twitching unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her splenii, like two loyal companions, never let her down during workouts.
meanings.sent5: The splenii muscles, like diligent workers, tirelessly hold up the upper body.
